head.title: Palos Verdes Peninsula Unified School District

meta.name: description
meta.content: Palos Verdes Peninsula Unified School District has PreK through 12th grade in its district in Palos Verdes Estates, CA.

div.p: Learn about enrolling your children at Palos Verdes Peninsula schools....read more

div.br: District and school offices are closed at this time and until further notice due to concerns surrounding COVID-19. While offices remain closed, online enrollment for residents and permit applications for interdistrict transfer students will still be accepted. Visit the Enrollment Center webpage above for the most up-to-date information regarding Enrollment Center procedures.

div.div:
New student enrollment for the 2020-21 school year is now open. Families can begin Step 1 of the process online when enrollment opens. Information regarding the enrollment process is available at www.pvpusd.net/enrollment.
For additional information, please contact the District's Enrollment Center at enroll@pvpusd.net or (310) 896-3401.

PVPUSD understands the concern expressed by families, students and staff regarding the global outbreak of coronavirus, also known as COVID-19. The health and safety of students and staff is a priority for our schools.
To help you stay informed, we have developed a web page for updates, information and resources related to coronavirus at www.pvpusd.net/virus/
We continue to work with multiple agencies to gather the latest news, information and guidance:
- Los Angeles County Department of Public Health
- Los Angeles County Office of Education
- U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC)

section.h1: A World Class School District At A Glance

div.address: 375 Via Almar Palos Verdes Estates, CA 90274 Phone: (310) 378-9966
